entity.name: Yamiche Alcindor
entity.description: American journalist; White House correspondent for PBS NewsHour

text: @Yamiche The coronavirus is still killing as many as 1,000 Americans per day — but the Trump administration isn’t saying much. It is not a good idea to start campaign Rallies. Trump should protect the health of constituents. Will they even wear masks?
